doc.title: Gweipo
doc.plot: Gweipo is a story about Rebecca, a sixty year old British woman, whose husband's sudden death allows his darkest secret to surface: he had a child with another woman. Henry, his Eurasian son, desires to meet his sister, driving Rebecca to follow him across the streets of Hong Kong. Through her physical and emotional journey she challenges her personal limitations creating a delicate and compelling allegory for modern Hong Kong.
